title: *Top Floor 3-Bedroom & 3-Bathroom Apt w/Private Roofdeck* 1009 4A
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We are the exclusive brokers for this building', '*Top Floor 3-Bedroom & 3-Bathroom Apt w/Private Roofdeck*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*The Apartment Features:*', '3 Queen-Size Bedrooms / Great Closet Space / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows / Lots of Natural Light / 3-Full Bathrooms / Sunny Living Room / *Private Roofdeck* Terrace / *Private Balcony* / AC Unit in Each Room / Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Microwave / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom /', '*The Building Features:*', 'Laundry Room / Courtyard / Rooftop /', 'Two Blocks Away from Maria Hernandez Park', 'A Step Away from the M Train and a Short walk to J/Z/L Trains', "Enjoy the Best Things that Bushwick has to offer just Around the Corner: Fine Time, Bushwick Bakery, Farewell Bar, Cafe Moca, Henry's Wine & Spirit, Carmenta’s, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, and So Much More to Explore!", '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $180,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
